org.webchecker.forms

Class RadioInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.webchecker.forms.Input
      • org.webchecker.forms.RadioInput

  • public class RadioInput
extends Input
    Set of HTML form input elements with type radio and same name attribute. Extends from Input, but differs itself by considering also default values of input elements.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jindřich Máca (Tuník)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RadioInput(java.lang.String name, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> defaultValues)
      Calls default Input.Input(String, Type) constructor, but also sets this defaultValues.
      RadioInput(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> defaultValues)
      Calls default Input.Input(String, Type, String) constructor, but also sets this defaultValues.

        public RadioInput(@NotNull
                  java.lang.String name,

        name - String name of the RadioInput
        defaultValues - ArrayList of default values possible for this RadioInput

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if given name is null or empty

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultValues

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDefaultValues()
        Getter for the input default value.
        Returns:
        input default value of this RadioInput

      • setDefaultValue

        public void setDefaultValue(java.lang.Integer index)
                     throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Sets input default value from input default values list by index of the value in that list.
        Parameters:
        index - Integer position of default value in input default values list
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is null or is out of range (index < 0 || index >= size() )

      • containsDefaultValue

        public java.lang.Integer containsDefaultValue(java.lang.String value)
        Gets Integer index position of the last occurrence of default value from input default values list.
        Parameters:
        value - String name of the default value
        Returns:
        the Integer index of the last occurrence of the default value name in input default values list, or -1 if this input default values list does not contain this default this value, that applies also for null
